name: Metanet Hunter SE
description:
Metanet Hunter SE

Hey there, folks! Metanet Hunter SE has been released! As an entry to GBJam, it was finished in 10 days! And in those 10 days... We at The Nekuzen Team have created potentially the best Metanet Hunter... ever.

Do you like platformers? Do you like quirky little games that'll make you laugh and cry? Well... This game is for you! With tons of unique levels that'll keep you entertained for weeks, orb-obliterating action and baddie-bashing goodness, and tough-as-nails difficulty, you're in for a treat!

Did I mention... It's free! Yes, free! So what are you waiting for? Go play it! You won't be disappointed.

If you like the game, maybe consider donating a little to help us for future projects! It'd be greatly appreciated. You don't have to pay to get to the downloads section, but if you toss a dollar or two that'd do wonders for us!

Vote for it!

http://jams.gamejolt.io/gbjam3/games/metanet-hunte...
